description:
Haiji suddenly faints.
The residents realize how Haiji has been supporting them, and Nico-chan encourages Kakeru and Prince to reconcile.
However, the stubborn boys refuse to bridge the gap.
The next day, Shindo suggests that the team pick a temporary captain.
When all the older members refuse, Kakeru agrees to do the job.
Desperate to do something about Prince, Kakeru follows him around while nagging him. Prince`s opposition increases in response.
As the residents are unable to even feed themselves, someone comes to extend a helping hand...
Source: crunchyroll
